data.text: I made a reservation for their buffet last week for my cousin’s birthday and I was in contact with Ms. Nuwani. She’s working in the hotel and is very helpful the whole time. She’s very patient answering all of my questions. Thank you for the good service. Will definitely come  back next time. ❤️
data.title: Buffet reservation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay at the hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you again.
Thanks and Regards
Abhinav Abhay Uniyal
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Abhinav Abhay  Uniyal

data.text: So guy I introduce myself first my name is Kenn from France (Paris ) and I am a regular customer in the hotel then in the clubs 1st floor also so today was my first experience on the ground floor inside the bar which is very bad anyways I went there with my friends then we were 5 people with 2 more old friends inside they were drinking already like 3 btls then we took only 2 more drinks it’s 02am then the lady inside the bar her name’s (SHARMALA) she told me guys you’re playing pool and you’re not spending next time I’ll not let you go in them I explain to her that they just took a dinner and my friend they’re MUSLIM means no alcohol so that’s why we took only 2 drinks and we’re leaving anyways I want to pay my drink only she told me I’ll take payment for the 2 drinks , I said no I’ll pay for only my drink and my friend will pay for his drink like she made me uncomfortable next to my friend on asking me like 3 times then I explain again please kindly take a payment only for my drink they she started screaming next time guys I’ll not let you come … I said please talk slowly and don’t talk to me like this otherwise call me the manager she said there is no manager talk to me I decide so I asked her to give me her name to complain she didn’t even have the tag with her name which is not allowed already I asked her like 3 times she said I’ll not give you my name what you’ll do !!! Then I called the front desk manager on duty he gave me her name and he asked her where is your tag she said I don’t know then he said why the customer is asking for your name and you said no I’ll not give next to him she refused anyways I’m so disappointed with this bad service and miss of respect this category of people shouldn’t work in such amazing city liKe DUABI ‼️‼️
data.title: Such improfessional and rude people they shouldn’t work in such amazing city like DUBAI ( SHARMALA GROUND FLOOR)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you may have encountered during your stay.
Your feedback has been shared with our management team so that we can take appropriate steps to improve our services and ensure that future guests have a better experience.
If you would like to discuss your concerns further, please feel free to contact me directly. We value your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.
owner_response.author: Abhinav Abhay  Uniyal

data.text:
The hotel needs major renovation. The carpet, restroom fittings, the furnitures need to be updated.

The hotel has relatively inexperienced set of staff and are not fully aware of routine hotel customer service requirements.

Unless you are in need of a hotel in that particular neighborhood, you should look elsewhere.
data.title: Needs major renovation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Tanvir,
It was our greatest privilege to have you stay at the Chelsea Plaza Hotel, and I personally thank you for taking time to share your valued feedback.
At Chelsea Plaza Hotel, we strive to ensure that every guest is provided with the best possible service and attention. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused during your stay. We have noted all your concerns, and we will convey all your constructive feedback to the management.
We look forward to welcoming you again with improved services.
owner_response.author: Abhinav Abhay  Uniyal

data.text: Everything was great. Breakfast was very delicious. I was very happy. The staff's behavior was more than wonderful. Specifically, Rohit was very good for us. Restaurant ambience is very good. The pool side area is good for dining.will visit again thanks agai one more time Mr.Rohit😍
data.title: Morning breakfast

data.text:
Having read some reviews about the noise from nightclubs at this hotel, its fair to say I was a bit concerned about the booking which had been made by my employer.  I'm pleased to say that I was allocated a room (403) in the quiet part of the hotel and was not disturbed by noise at all.  Colleagues who were affected asked to move and were moved to quieter rooms whenever possible. 

The rooms are big, and although the fittings are a little tired everything was functional and comfortable, with piping hot water at good pressure.  Room service restaurant meals, while not haute cuisine, were perfectly acceptable and prompt. Daily cleaning of the room was good.

Service from the hotel staff was exemplary - they were all very helpful and responsive - answering questions, obtaining cabs and providing printing on request. If I were looking for low-cost accommodation in Dubai again, I would be very happy to stay here again.
data.title: Highly responsive staff - exceptional service
